wikipedia_page.main: George Markham (30 March 1763 - 30 September 1822) served as Dean of York from 1802 and Rector of Stokesley until his death.

response: *Rev. Hon. Thomas Alfred Harris (24 March 1782 - 15 December 1823) m. Maria Markham, daughter of Very Rev. George Markham
# Elizabeth Evelyn, who married George Markham, son of William Markham, Archbishop of York, and later John Pulteney.
